pages.title: Becoming an Original Vampire
pages.text: Only the strongest vampires can ascend to the rank of the Originals. This **dark rite** grants true immortality.

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text:
The ritual must be performed using: 
- **1 Blood Altar** 
- **1 Block of Eclipsium** 
- **1 Bottle of Vampire Blood** 
- Must be surrounded by **Candles**.

pages.title: The Ritual
pages.text: The vampire must **cut themselves with a dagger** and drink from the altar. This will cause their body to temporarily die before being reborn.

pages.title: Powers of the Ancients
pages.text: - **True Immortality**: Only a **White Oak Stake** can kill an Original Vampire. \n- **No Sun Weakness**: Daylight is no longer a threat. \n- **Domination**: Command lesser vampires and thralls.
